なんとか倒したぁ……\nはあ、はあ……ぁ～……しんど……:
I managed to defeat it...
*pant pant*... Ahh... It's so hard...
まさか、こんなに苦戦するなんて……: I didn't think we'd have such a hard time...
メイズシンドロームからくるコンディションの悪化もあるが、\nそれだけじゃなさそう:
There was also the worsening condition that came from the Maze Syndrome, but...
Looks like that's not all.
普段いるエリアとは比べ物になりませんわね……: It's nothing compared to the area we usually go to...
ほんっと、しぶといよね。\n普段なら倒せてるはずの攻撃でも倒しきれなかったし……:
You really are stubborn, aren't you?
Even an attack that should have been able to defeat him wouldn't have been enough...
それでもなんとかなったのは、%usernameusernameuserna%さん:
Even so, the only thing that worked out was %usernameusernameuserna%'s command
It's the result of all the training we've done so far...
%usernameusernameuserna%さんのいない以前のわたくし達だっ:
Before %usernameusernameuserna%-san was gone, we would have...
I wonder what happened...
ってかさ……これから先、\nあんなの相手にしながら進まなきゃいけないの？:
Actually... from now on,
Do we have to keep going while dealing with that?
というより、深くに進むほど、\nもっと強力な敵が増えるんじゃないですか？:
Or rather, the deeper she went, the more
Won't there be more powerful enemies?
うへぇ、考えるだけでしんどいね～。\nただでさえ奇跡みたいな勝ちを拾ったんだし。:
Wow, just thinking about it is tiring.
I've already picked up a miraculous victory.
今はここが限界……: This is as far as I can go...
わたくしのせいですわ。%usernameusernameuserna%さんの制止:
It's my fault. I didn't even listen to %usernameusernameuserna%-san's warning.
You're acting all high and mighty...
七彩は何も悪くないし、何も間違っていない。引き際も決めていた。\nそんなあのとき:
Shichika hadn't done anything wrong, and he hadn't made any mistakes. He had also decided when to withdraw.
I was the one who supported your decision back then.
お前は俺のその判断を『間違っていた』と言いたいのか？: Are you trying to say that my judgment was "wrong"?
じゃあ、七彩は正しいし、今のこれはただ『運が悪かった』だけ。\nあのときの主体性:
Then Shichika was right, and this was just "unlucky" right now.
Please don't throw away your initiative back then. I was really happy.
――今の戦闘で、ほとんどの弾薬と推進剤を使い切ってしまったね。\nこれ以上の戦闘:
—We've used up most of our ammunition and propellant in that battle.
I don't think we'll be able to fight any more battles.
結局、タツミヤ鉱もあんまりなかったしね。: In the end, there wasn't much Tatsumiya Ore, either.
そうだな、だが贅沢を言ってられる状況でもない。\nみんな、疲労の他にも、問題があ:
That's true, but this isn't a situation where we can afford to indulge ourselves.
Everyone, there's another problem besides fatigue, isn't there?
動悸や目まい、思考の鈍化やネガティブ傾向……\nメイズシンドロームを発症してる。:
Heart palpitations, dizziness, dulling thoughts, negative tendencies...
She's suffering from Maze Syndrome. Everyone here, myself included.
一刻の猶予もない。今すぐ地上に撤退する。: We don't have a moment to waste. We need to retreat to the surface right now.
俺の提案に、誰も反対はしなかった。\n先ほどの戦闘が続けばどうなるか、考えるに難:
No one objected to my suggestion.
It wasn't hard to think about what would happen if the previous battle continued.
うう～、きもちわるい……。早く出よー！: Ugh, that's disgusting... Let's get out of here!
ラミの機体が一歩踏み出した、その瞬間。: The moment Rami's machine took a step forward...
まるで図ったかのようなタイミングで、\nラミ機の足元がぐしゃりと崩れ、陥没する。:
The timing was so perfect, it was almost as if she had planned it.
The lammy machine's feet crumpled and caved in.
ギリギリのところでラミの機体の腕を掴む。\n宙ぶらりんになった彼女の直下には、仄:
I grab Rami's machine arm at the last second.
Directly below her, hanging in midair, was a dark hole with a mouth.
機体の腕部に異常な負荷を検知し、アラームが響く。: An alarm rang out, detecting an abnormal load on the arm of the aircraft.
このままでは腕部が引きちぎれて、\n彼女の機体を落としてしまう。:
At this rate, her arm would be torn off
I dropped her machine.
めるが駆けつけて、一緒にラミの機体の腕を掴んだ。: Meguru rushes over and grabs Rami's machine arm with her.
ダメ！！ どんどん縁が崩れて、陥没が広がってる！\nそこも落ちるよ！:
No!! The edges are falling apart, and the cave-in is spreading!
You'll fall there, too!
く……ふたりとも、全力で跳躍ユニットを起動だ！\n上昇して、ここを逃れる！:
Ugh... Both of you, activate the jump unit with all your might!
I'll climb up and get out of here!
推進剤の残りはわずか。\nだが迷っている暇はない──！！:
There's only a little propellant left.
But there's no time to hesitate!!
引っ張り上げるぞ！\nせーの……！:
Let's pull him up!
One, two...!
俺達の機体も跳躍ユニットを起動。: Our aircraft also activates its jumping unit.
床のヒビが、天井まで……！？\nま、まさか……！！:
The cracks in the floor, all the way to the ceiling...!?
N-No way...!!
お前らだけでも先に脱出しろ！！: You guys should get out of here first!!
できるわけないでしょ！？ ってか、崩落が早い！\nもう間に合わ――:
There's no way I can do that! Wait, it's collapsing too fast!
I can't make it—
粉々になった岩盤の雨が、散弾銃のように降り注ぐ。\nこのエリア一帯がすべて崩れよ:
A rain of pulverized bedrock poured down like a shotgun.
The entire area was about to collapse.
全員が跳躍ユニットを起動する。\nだが崩落の勢いは止まず──:
Everyone activates their jumping units.
But the force of the collapse didn't stop.
俺達は、深淵へと飲み込まれていった――: We were swallowed up by the abyss――
